name: Wb Aero - DownThemAll!
description:
The DownThemAll! component for my Aero (glasser) theme. Looks best with firefox 3.5b4+.

Updates:
[7/28/2009]
- Changed the manager's icons to those already used in it's context menu. Should have a more consistent look this way
- Toolbarbuttons are animated
- The "Add URL..." dialog is different now too
[7/01/2009]
- Mostly just updates for Firefox 3.5
- Adjusted to better match the Wb Aero bookmark toolbar http://userstyles.org/styles/18094


The entire Wb Aero Theme:

style 19845
style 18094
